def_cn: (通常指药物不良的)副作用
def_en: The side-effects of a drug are the effects, usually bad ones, that the drug has on you in addition to its function of curing illness or pain.

def_cn: (通常指令人不快的)附带后果，意外后果
def_en: A side-effect of a situation is something unplanned and usually unpleasant that happens in addition to the main effects of that situation.
